spec.name: clarity_gain_thresholds
spec.description: Reference thresholds for clarity gain on a normalized 0–1 scale, with back-compat keys for the T2 smoke script.

scale.notes: If you have legacy 0–10 logs, normalize by dividing by 10.

thresholds.label: Low gain
thresholds.description: Early movement or surface relief — user starts to see around a corner.

thresholds.label: Medium gain
thresholds.description: Noticeable conceptual shift — a new angle or correction emerges.

thresholds.label: High gain
thresholds.description: Transformative insight or mindset reversal — strong confidence increase.
